thread.section_title: The Chess Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel - Review of The Chess Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JuniJudi
title: Great boutique hotel
text:
Rooms // clean, cozy, modern. Not big, not small, typical for Paris i would say. The bed is comfortable to sleep it, the wardrobe is big enough to leave your stuff. There is a small safe and fridge - but as far as i understood no free of charge bottled water.
Bathroom // big enough, clean shower, clean sink, good towels, nice amenities.
Breakfast // 22â‚¬. Well, the fruits are fresh, but overall a bit overpriced for what you get. Ots in the same room where the reception is. I took it only 1 day out of my 4 night stay. Good thing is that its almost until 11am - which is quite long.
